projects.name: Design handoff
projects.description: Transform a UX student's design into a React-based landing page for a gym/fitness club. This project bridges the gap between design and development, showcasing the art of bringing visuals to life with code.

projects.name: Labyrinth
projects.description: A text-based adventure provided by an API in form of a labyrinth. The goal was to use the API and build an interface that gives the user control over what to do next. Focus was on the global state management with Zustand to store the data from the API into the global state.

projects.name: Movies
projects.description: Utilizing themoviedb.org's API to showcase movies and their details. Features fetching popular movies, rendering movie specifics, and managing image URLs. Designed with a focus on responsiveness and accessibility. Enhancements include error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: Happy Thoughts App: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data.

projects.name: Survey
projects.description: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Design is flexible but should prioritise accessibility.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: This project is about building a simple weather app that uses a weather API to tell today's weather, city, temp, sunrise/sunset and a 5-day forecast.

projects.name: Library
projects.description: This project is about building a digital library using an array of books, where you can sort the books, use a filter or a button to generate a random book.
